room_title: Escape room "Museum Heist" by Breakout Games - Oklahoma City in Oklahoma City
room_address: 2501 W. Memorial Rd., Suite 227 Oklahoma City, OK 73134
room_description: It's the eve of a prestigious art gallery opening, and the museum owner has stolen a rare collection of artwork - the centerpieces of the exhibit. Can your team recover the stolen masterpieces, escape the room and make it to the gallery before it opens in one hour?
